alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:52PM PST until December 15 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
